attributes.action: reject any attempt by Lewisham council to dispose of the Grade || listed building known as Beckenham Place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Beckenham Place Park is the largest public open space in Lewisham.The Mansion at Beckenham Place is an iconic landmark and the focal point of the park.The mansion' upkeep has been substantially neglected for decades by Lewisham council and now features highly in English Heritage's Buildings at risk register.The council now plans to dispose of the Mansion(together with a curtilage of land taken from the park),while spending upwards of £50,000-00 on pointless consultation processes-money that could have paid for necessary repairs to the roof to make the mansion watertight and prevent further deterioration.Please help to keep the whole park and the mansion open to the public.
